title: Keith Thurman vs. Danny Garcia results: Live blog, fight scorecard, updates on CBS
text:
2m ago • 1 min read 
The welterweight crown is up for grabs Saturday night live on CBS as WBA champion Keith Thurman (27-0-1, 22 KOs) puts his belt on the line in a title unification fight against undefeated WBC champion Danny Garcia (33-0, 19 KOs) at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York. 
Just the second primetime boxing telecast on CBS since 1978, Thurman-Garcia will be a star-studded affair with former five-division champion “Sugar” Ray Leonard -- who himself once unified the WBA and WBC belts -- calling the action alongside Mauro Ranallo live on CBS and CBS All Access beginning at 9 p.m. ET . 
CBS Sports will be with you the entire way with a live scorecard and constant updates from the big fight. If you are unable to view the updates in the live blog below, please click here. Thurman vs. Garcia scorecard
